GE07mbh_17_u:000.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_17_u:001.001c: pāṇḍavāḥ kim akurvanta tathā kṛṣṇe divaṃ gate
GE07mbh_17_u:001.002a: śrutvaiva kauravo rājā vṛṣṇīnāṃ kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_17_u:001.002c: prasthāne matim ādhāya vākyam arjunam abravīt
GE07mbh_17_u:001.003a: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni sarvāṇy eva mahāmate
GE07mbh_17_u:001.003c: karmanyāsam ahaṃ manye tvam api draṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_17_u:001.004a: ity uktaḥ sa tu kaunteyaḥ kālaḥ kāla iti bruvan
GE07mbh_17_u:001.004c: anvapadyata tad vākyaṃ bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya vīryavān
GE07mbh_17_u:001.005a: arjunasya mataṃ jñātvā bhīmaseno yamau tathā
GE07mbh_17_u:001.005c: anvapadyanta tad vākyaṃ yad uktaṃ savyasācinā
GE07mbh_17_u:001.007a: abhiṣicya svarājye tu taṃ rājānaṃ parikṣitam
GE07mbh_17_u:001.008a: eṣa putrasya te putraḥ kururājo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_17_u:001.008c: yadūnāṃ pariśeṣaś ca vajro rājā kṛtaś ca ha
GE07mbh_17_u:001.009c: vajro rājā tvayā rakṣyo mā cādharme manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:001.010a: ity uktvā dharmarājaḥ sa vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:001.010c: mātulasya ca vṛddhasya rāmādīnāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_17_u:001.011c: śrāddhāny uddiśya sarveṣāṃ cakāra vidhivat tadā
GE07mbh_17_u:001.011d-0003_03: abhojayat svādu bhojyaṃ kīrtayitvā ca śārṅgiṇam
GE07mbh_17_u:001.012a: dadau ratnāni vāsāṃsi grāmān aśvān rathān api
GE07mbh_17_u:001.014a: tatas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samānāyya yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:001.015a: te śrutvaiva vacas tasya paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:001.016a: naivaṃ kartavyam iti te tadocus te narādhipam
GE07mbh_17_u:001.017c: gamanāya matiṃ cakre bhrātaraś cāsya te tadā
GE07mbh_17_u:001.017d-0005_03: prāptaṃ kaliyugaṃ jñātvā sahadevo hasann iva
GE07mbh_17_u:001.017d-0005_04: rājñas tu kathayām āsa dharmo naṣṭas tu bhārata
GE07mbh_17_u:001.017d-0005_05: rājā ca durmanā rājan paryāptaṃ jīvitaṃ mama
GE07mbh_17_u:001.017d-0006_01: iti cintya gate rājan govinde dharmadhāraṇe
GE07mbh_17_u:001.018a: tataḥ sa rājā kauravyo dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:001.019a: bhīmārjunau yamau caiva draupadī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_17_u:001.021a: tataḥ praruruduḥ sarvāḥ striyo dṛṣṭvā nararṣabhān
GE07mbh_17_u:001.022a: harṣo 'bhavac ca sarveṣāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ gamanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_17_u:001.023a: bhrātaraḥ pañca kṛṣṇā ca ṣaṣṭhī śvā caiva saptamaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:001.023e: paurair anugato dūraṃ sarvair antaḥpurais tathā
GE07mbh_17_u:001.024a: na cainam aśakat kaś cin nivartasveti bhāṣitum
GE07mbh_17_u:001.026c: śiṣṭāḥ parikṣitaṃ tv anyā mātaraḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_17_u:001.027a: pāṇḍavāś ca mahātmāno draupadī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_17_u:001.028c: abhijagmur bahūn deśān saritaḥ parvatāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_17_u:001.029a: yudhiṣṭhiro yayāv agre bhīmas tu tadanantaram
GE07mbh_17_u:001.029c: arjunas tasya cānv eva yamau caiva yathākramam
GE07mbh_17_u:001.031a: śvā caivānuyayāv ekaḥ pāṇḍavān prasthitān vane
GE07mbh_17_u:001.031c: krameṇa te yayur vīrā lauhityaṃ salilārṇavam
GE07mbh_17_u:001.032a: gāṇḍīvaṃ ca dhanur divyaṃ na mumoca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:001.033a: agniṃ te dadṛśus tatra sthitaṃ śailam ivāgrataḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:001.034a: tato devaḥ sa saptārciḥ pāṇḍavān idam abravīt
GE07mbh_17_u:001.034c: bho bho pāṇḍusutā vīrāḥ pāvakaṃ māṃ vibodhata
GE07mbh_17_u:001.036a: aham agniḥ kuruśreṣṭhā mayā dagdhaṃ ca khāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_17_u:001.037a: ayaṃ vaḥ phalguno bhrātā gāṇḍīvaṃ paramāyudham
GE07mbh_17_u:001.037c: parityajya vanaṃ yātu nānenārtho 'sti kaś cana
GE07mbh_17_u:001.038a: cakraratnaṃ tu yat kṛṣṇe sthitam āsīn mahātmani
GE07mbh_17_u:001.038c: gataṃ tac ca punar haste kālenaiṣyati tasya ha
GE07mbh_17_u:001.040a: tatas te bhrātaraḥ sarve dhanaṃjayam acodayan
GE07mbh_17_u:001.040c: sa jale prākṣipat tat tu tathākṣayyau maheṣudhī
GE07mbh_17_u:001.040d-0007_01: yathā ghanasya gagane śabdo bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_17_u:001.040d-0007_02: salile kṣipyamāṇasya gāṇḍīvasya tathā hy abhūt
GE07mbh_17_u:001.041c: yayuś ca pāṇḍavā vīrās tatas te dakṣiṇāmukhāḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:001.043a: tataḥ punaḥ samāvṛttāḥ paścimāṃ diśam eva te
GE07mbh_17_u:001.043c: dadṛśur dvārakāṃ cāpi sāgareṇa pariplutām haripādāṅkavinyāsatīrthīkṛtamahābhuvam
GE07mbh_17_u:002.001a: tatas te niyatātmāna udīcīṃ diśam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:002.001b-0010_01: tatas te brāhmaṇīṃ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ jale sthitam
GE07mbh_17_u:002.001b-0010_02: madhyamāṃśaṃ śivaṃ gatvā dṛṣṭvā rudraṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_17_u:002.001b-0010_04: īśānaṃ tu namaskṛtya snātvā haṃsodake śubhe
GE07mbh_17_u:002.001b-0010_05: devadevaṃ tu kedāraṃ dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:002.001b-0010_06: piṇḍaṃ dattvā vidhānena pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpya vai
GE07mbh_17_u:002.001b-0010_07: udakaṃ vidhivat pītvā tato nandāṃ jagāma vai
GE07mbh_17_u:002.002a: taṃ cāpy atikramantas te dadṛśur vālukārṇavam
GE07mbh_17_u:002.003a: teṣāṃ tu gacchatāṃ śīghraṃ sarveṣāṃ yogadharmiṇām
GE07mbh_17_u:002.004a: tāṃ tu prapatitāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:002.005a: nādharmaś caritaḥ kaś cid rājaputryā paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_17_u:002.005c: kāraṇaṃ kiṃ nu tad rājan yat kṛṣṇā patitā bhuvi
GE07mbh_17_u:002.008c: taṃ cāpi patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmo rājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_17_u:002.009c: so 'yaṃ mādravatīputraḥ kasmān nipatito bhuvi yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_17_u:002.010a: ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ prājñaṃ naiṣo 'manyata kaṃ cana
GE07mbh_17_u:002.010b-0012_01: kālatrayavidaś cāpi na me guhyaṃ prakāśitam
GE07mbh_17_u:002.010c: tena doṣeṇa patitas tasmād eṣa nṛpātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:002.011a: ity uktvā tu samutsṛjya sahadevaṃ yayau tadā
GE07mbh_17_u:002.011c: bhrātṛbhiḥ saha kaunteyaḥ śunā caiva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:002.012a: kṛṣṇāṃ nipatitāṃ dṛṣṭvā sahadevaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_17_u:002.012c: ārto bandhupriyaḥ śūro nakulo nipapāta ha
GE07mbh_17_u:002.013c: punar eva tadā bhīmo rājānam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_17_u:002.016a: rūpeṇa matsamo nāsti kaś cid ity asya darśanam
GE07mbh_17_u:002.016c: adhikaś cāham evaika ity asya manasi sthitam
GE07mbh_17_u:002.017a: nakulaḥ patitas tasmād āgaccha tvaṃ vṛkodara
GE07mbh_17_u:002.017c: yasya yad vihitaṃ vīra so 'vaśyaṃ tad upāśnute
GE07mbh_17_u:002.018a: tāṃs tu prapatitān dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:002.020a: anṛtaṃ na smarāmy asya svaireṣv api mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:002.020c: atha kasya vikāro 'yaṃ yenāyaṃ patito bhuvi
GE07mbh_17_u:002.021a: ekāhnā nirdaheyaṃ vai śatrūn ity arjuno 'bravīt
GE07mbh_17_u:002.021c: na ca tat kṛtavān eṣa śūramānī tato 'patat
GE07mbh_17_u:002.022a: avamene dhanur grāhān eṣa sarvāṃś ca phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:002.022c: yathā coktaṃ tathā caiva kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_17_u:002.023a: ity uktvā prasthito rājā bhīmo 'tha nipapāta ha
GE07mbh_17_u:002.024a: bho bho rājann avekṣasva patito 'haṃ priyas tava
GE07mbh_17_u:002.024c: kiṃnimittaṃ ca patanaṃ brūhi me yadi vettha ha
GE07mbh_17_u:002.025a: atibhuktaṃ ca bhavatā prāṇena ca vikatthase
GE07mbh_17_u:002.025c: anavekṣya paraṃ pārtha tenāsi patitaḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_17_u:002.026c: śvā tv eko 'nuyayau yas te bahuśaḥ kīrtito mayā
GE07mbh_17_u:003.001a: tataḥ saṃnādayañ śakro divaṃ bhūmiṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.001c: rathenopayayau pārtham ārohety abravīc ca tam
GE07mbh_17_u:003.002a: sa bhrātṝn patitān dṛṣṭvā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.003a: bhrātaraḥ patitā me 'tra āgaccheyur mayā saha
GE07mbh_17_u:003.003c: na vinā bhrātṛbhiḥ svargam icche gantuṃ sureśvara
GE07mbh_17_u:003.004c: sāsmābhiḥ saha gaccheta tad bhavān anumanyatām
GE07mbh_17_u:003.005a: bhrātṝn drakṣyasi putrāṃs tvam agratas tridivaṃ gatān
GE07mbh_17_u:003.005c: kṛṣṇayā sahitān sarvān mā śuco bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_17_u:003.006a: nikṣipya mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ gatās te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_17_u:003.006c: anena tvaṃ śarīreṇa svargaṃ gantā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.007a: ayaṃ śvā bhūtabhavyeśa bhakto māṃ nityam eva ha
GE07mbh_17_u:003.007c: sa gaccheta mayā sārdham ānṛśaṃsyā hi me matiḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.008a: amartyatvaṃ matsamatvaṃ ca rājañ; śriyaṃ kṛtsnāṃ mahatīṃ caiva kīrtim
GE07mbh_17_u:003.008c: saṃprāpto 'dya svargasukhāni ca tvaṃ; tyaja śvānaṃ nātra nṛśaṃsam asti
GE07mbh_17_u:003.009a: anāryam āryeṇa sahasranetra; śakyaṃ kartuṃ duṣkaram etad ārya
GE07mbh_17_u:003.009c: mā me śriyā saṃgamanaṃ tayāstu; yasyāḥ kṛte bhaktajanaṃ tyajeyam
GE07mbh_17_u:003.010a: svarge loke śvavatāṃ nāsti dhiṣṇyam; iṣṭāpūrtaṃ krodhavaśā haranti
GE07mbh_17_u:003.010c: tato vicārya kriyatāṃ dharmarāja; tyaja śvānaṃ nātra nṛśaṃsam asti
GE07mbh_17_u:003.011a: bhaktatyāgaṃ prāhur atyantapāpaṃ; tulyaṃ loke brahmavadhyākṛtena
GE07mbh_17_u:003.011c: tasmān nāhaṃ jātu kathaṃ canādya; tyakṣyāmy enaṃ svasukhārthī mahendra
GE07mbh_17_u:003.011d-0013_04: yateyaṃ vai nityam etad vrataṃ me
GE07mbh_17_u:003.012a: śunā dṛṣṭaṃ krodhavaśā haranti; yad dattam iṣṭaṃ vivṛtam atho hutaṃ ca
GE07mbh_17_u:003.012c: tasmāc chunas tyāgam imaṃ kuruṣva; śunas tyāgāt prāpsyase devalokam
GE07mbh_17_u:003.013a: tyaktvā bhrātṝn dayitāṃ cāpi kṛṣṇāṃ; prāpto lokaḥ karmaṇā svena vīra
GE07mbh_17_u:003.013c: śvānaṃ cainaṃ na tyajase kathaṃ nu; tyāgaṃ kṛtsnaṃ cāsthito muhyase 'dya
GE07mbh_17_u:003.014a: na vidyate saṃdhir athāpi vigraho; mṛtair martyair iti lokeṣu niṣṭhā
GE07mbh_17_u:003.014c: na te mayā jīvayituṃ hi śakyā; tasmāt tyāgas teṣu kṛto na jīvatām
GE07mbh_17_u:003.015c: mitradrohas tāni catvāri śakra; bhaktatyāgaś caiva samo mato me
GE07mbh_17_u:003.016c: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prītiyukto narendraṃ; ślakṣṇair vākyaiḥ saṃstavasaṃprayuktaiḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.018a: purā dvaitavane cāsi mayā putra parīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.018c: pānīyārthe parākrāntā yatra te bhrātaro hatāḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.019a: bhīmārjunau parityajya yatra tvaṃ bhrātarāv ubhau
GE07mbh_17_u:003.019c: mātroḥ sāmyam abhīpsan vai nakulaṃ jīvam icchasi
GE07mbh_17_u:003.020a: ayaṃ śvā bhakta ity eva tyakto devarathas tvayā
GE07mbh_17_u:003.020c: tasmāt svarge na te tulyaḥ kaś cid asti narādhipa
GE07mbh_17_u:003.022a: tato dharmaś ca śakraś ca marutaś cāśvināv api
GE07mbh_17_u:003.022c: devā devarṣayaś caiva ratham āropya pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_17_u:003.023a: prayayuḥ svair vimānais te siddhāḥ kāmavihāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.024a: sa taṃ rathaṃ samāsthāya rājā kurukulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.026a: ye 'pi rājarṣayaḥ sarve te cāpi samupasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.027d-0014_01: tejāṃsi yāni dṛṣṭāni bhūmiṣṭhena tvayā vibho
GE07mbh_17_u:003.028a: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā rājā vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_17_u:003.028c: devān āmantrya dharmātmā svapakṣāṃś caiva pārthivān
GE07mbh_17_u:003.029a: śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ sthānam adya me
GE07mbh_17_u:003.029c: tad eva prāptum icchāmi lokān anyān na kāmaye
GE07mbh_17_u:003.030a: rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā devarājaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.031a: sthāne 'smin vasa rājendra karmabhir nirjite śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.031c: kiṃ tvaṃ mānuṣyakaṃ sneham adyāpi parikarṣasi
GE07mbh_17_u:003.032a: siddhiṃ prāpto 'si paramāṃ yathā nānyaḥ pumān kva cit
GE07mbh_17_u:003.032c: naiva te bhrātaraḥ sthānaṃ saṃprāptāḥ kurunandana
GE07mbh_17_u:003.033a: adyāpi mānuṣo bhāvaḥ spṛśate tvāṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_17_u:003.033c: svargo 'yaṃ paśya devarṣīn siddhāṃś ca tridivālayān
GE07mbh_17_u:003.034c: punar evābravīd dhīmān idaṃ vacanam arthavat
GE07mbh_17_u:003.035a: tair vinā notsahe vastum iha daityanibarhaṇa
GE07mbh_17_u:003.035c: gantum icchāmi tatrāhaṃ yatra me bhrātaro gatāḥ
GE07mbh_17_u:003.036a: yatra sā bṛhatī śyāmā buddhisattvaguṇānvitā 17,003.036c draupadī yoṣitāṃ śreṣṭhā yatra caiva priyā mama
